events.message: The insured reported their car was involved in a rear-end collision at a stoplight.
Based on the incident details, the claim was classified under Auto Accident coverage.
A claims agent specializing in vehicle accidents was assigned to handle this case promptly.
The insured was sent a confirmation acknowledging receipt of their auto accident claim.
The insured was asked to submit the police report and photos of the damaged vehicle.
All requested documents, including the accident report and vehicle photos, were received.
An investigation into the circumstances of the collision was initiated by the claims team.
Investigation concluded with confirmation that the insured was not at fault in the collision.
A settlement proposal was sent to the insured covering the vehicle repair costs.
The insured expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and quick handling of the claim.
The claim was formally approved by the claims supervisor without any further conditions.
Payment for the approved vehicle repair has been successfully issued to the insuredâ€™s account.
The claim was closed after confirming all payments were processed and the insured was fully reimbursed.
All claim files and documents have been archived according to company data retention policies.
